songs.title: Way With Words
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Drive into my skull
With your malicious whisper
It hurts because it's true
And you love to see me writhing
So you just keep on slicing
Rub the salt into my wounds

[Pre-Chorus]
When you're finished
You just close your mouth
I'll be left alone to face myself

[Chorus]
You've got a way with words
Know how to make it hurt
From you, it stings the worst
You have got a way with words
You've got a way with words
Know how to make it hurt
From you, it stings the worst
You have got a way with words
